name: Env
documentation: Class representing the real-world environment, providing basic information like current time, date, etc.

current_date.name: current_date
current_date.documentation: Return today's date in the current locale.

current_time.name: current_time
current_time.documentation: Return current time in the current locale.

current_date_time.name: current_date_time
current_date_time.documentation: Return current date/time in the current locale.

current_time_zone.name: current_time_zone
current_time_zone.documentation: Return the timezone of the current locale.
